name: Snow Shooter
description:
Snow Shooter
It's a multiplayer team shooter, the objective is capture the flag and we're thinking of 5v5 to begin with.
Players have 2 guns, an ice gun and a fire gun. Ice guns freeze enemies and fire gun melts allies and obstacles. Overtime the map will melt and change to open new pathways or close off pathways. The ice gun can also create obstacles and blocks to platform on.


Controls
WASD - Move
Space - Jump
Left Click - Ice Blast
Right Click - Fire Ball


Instructions
In order to play multiplayer online you must enter the IP address of a host. For example, this would be their IPv4 address from Hamachi.
